pageContext.claim: “The Fake News Networks, those that knowingly have a sick and biased AGENDA, are worried about the competition and quality of Sinclair Broadcast. The “Fakers” at CNN, NBC, ABC & CBS have done so much dishonest reporting that they should only be allowed to get awards for fiction!”
pageContext.analysis: Reporters at established news organizations to do purposely create false reports; that would be a firing offense.
